name: stb-component-page
description: Main full-screen component to build user interface.

scripts.sass: node-sass --indent-width 4 sass/develop.480.scss css/develop.480.css && node-sass --indent-width 4 sass/release.480.scss css/release.480.css && node-sass --indent-width 4 sass/develop.576.scss css/develop.576.css && node-sass --indent-width 4 sass/release.576.scss css/release.576.css && node-sass --indent-width 4 sass/develop.720.scss css/develop.720.css && node-sass --indent-width 4 sass/release.720.scss css/release.720.css && node-sass --indent-width 4 sass/develop.1080.scss css/develop.1080.css && node-sass --indent-width 4 sass/release.1080.scss css/release.1080.css
